casebody.data:
IndyMac Federal Bank, F.S.B., Appellee, v. OTM Investments, Inc. et al., Anthony, Exr., Appellant.

[Cite as IndyMac Fed. Bank, F.S.B. v. OTM Invests., Inc., 134 Ohio St.3d 358, 2012-Ohio-5496.]

(No. 2011-1581 Submitted December 4, 2012 Decided December 5, 2012.) The Law Offices of John D. Clunk, Jason A. Whitacre, Laura C. Infante, and Christopher M. Kovach, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings consistent with Fed. Home Loan Mtge. Corp. v. Schwartzwald, 134 Ohio St.3d 13, 2012-Ohio-5017, 979 N.E.2d 1214.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. *359Robert D. Anthony, pro se.
